about_the_game:
The Muse bestows her blessings upon you to assist you.

Blessings include:
■ Doubling the cash obtained in stages.
■ View the MUCCY of each curator.
■ Doubling the number of times to tag paintings.
■ Increase the probability of puzzles appearing in stages.

All of the above blessings can be activated and deactivated individually at any time. You can choose to use them as you desire to optimize your gaming experience.
Thank you all for your support! ❤

content_descriptors.notes: There will be naked pictures in the painting.

detailed_description:
The Muse bestows her blessings upon you to assist you.

Blessings include:
■ Doubling the cash obtained in stages.
■ View the MUCCY of each curator.
■ Doubling the number of times to tag paintings.
■ Increase the probability of puzzles appearing in stages.

All of the above blessings can be activated and deactivated individually at any time. You can choose to use them as you desire to optimize your gaming experience.
Thank you all for your support! ❤

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Players play the role of the person in charge of the art gallery to collect world famous paintings and save the crisis of the art gallery. A game version of the popular science book of art history is composed of simple and casual play elimination and lovely and relaxed painting style.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
